title: Can't log in
body:
when i try log into the client i keep receiving this error. i tried running the client as an administrator and that did not help

Update: i was able to log in but nothing will load and i cannot connect to chat :/

http://i.imgur.com/Jspxbzi.png

replies.body: These screenshots indicate some pretty big network problems that are failing to connect to the servers properly, so it can't stay connected or download assets.  Go over the instructions in this [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to work towards a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Hi, thanks for the quick response! I've now uninstalled a few programs that i thought may be interfering with my connection to the servers  as well as disabling windows firewall, and now i'm able to log in instantly instead of taking 5 minutes, but i still cannot connect to chat or load the client content. Although, I was able to connect with no problems at all on a different machine that is connected to the same network. Does this mean there's a program (or a few) that are causing the problem?

Thanks for the update, and I'm glad progress is being made!  I can't say for sure, but you can try downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help automatically configure your firewall settings just in case.  If it doesn't work, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help out.  Hang tight until then!
thanks again, ive submitted a support ticket. it seems like waiting through the night hasn't changed anything
